content.summary: Created consolidated Roles & Responsibilities document synthesizing all agent context files and system documentation into a single authoritative reference
key_sections: Stakeholder Hierarchy with Human Tech Lead authority
Detailed agent definitions for CC, CA, and WA
Quick reference matrix for agent capabilities
recommendations: Use this document as the primary reference for all agent onboarding
Update agent context files to reference this consolidated guide
Consider creating agent-specific quick reference cards
Review and update quarterly or after major role changes
